Posts.Content: H-LYNN wrote: Ladies, I am having a sharp pain on the right side of my navel.  It started Wed night and it is now Sunday night.  I indulged in a great deal of nachos and junk food on Wed night.  Since its Sunday night, I am thinking it cannot be the food,,,I of course will call my onc in the am.  I am totally scared...Does anyone have any idea of what it could be?  Could it be the liver/pancreas??  I have been in constant pain since I started AIs in August 2010...I have one spot of bc on my vertebrae, which is amazing since I was diagnosed with lungs, bones, and too many lymph nodes to mention.. Any advice would be appreciated..Hugs, Lynn Dx 10/12/2009, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IV, Grade 3, 2/2 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Pain on right side of navel H-LYNN Mazy1959

Posts.Content: Apr 29, 2011 11:27PM H-LYNN wrote: I had a ct scan of stomach from bottom of lungs down and it is CLEAR..Huge relief... stummed my onc about the pain...hmm..thats a first.....  Onc is sending me to a GI doc...At this point, I am just glad its not the mets...Ill take whatever it is... Thank you Ladies
Posts.Title: Pain on right side of navel H-LYNN Mazy1959

Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2011 08:06PM H-LYNN wrote: I was thinking constipation...I am taking morphine, which helps with the pain..but causes constipation... I am hoping it was the "wicked nacho"  too... Thank you Elizabeth
Posts.Title: Pain on right side of navel H-LYNN Mazy1959

Posts.Content: H-LYNN wrote: Hello Ladies, Today, I received the generic version of Aromasin by mail order, which is weird because I this is the first time...I have always received the name brand...That being said, is it less effective or the same...Please be honest...I called my onc "demanding" that they prescribed me the name brand and the mail order co..I received a credit, but I am scared....I do not want the generic version of drugs to fight mets...I do not even buy generic over the counter meds...Am I wrong?  Please help...Is it the same? Thank you, Dx 10/12/2009, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IV, Grade 3, 2/2 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: generic aromasin? H-LYNN Fitztwins

Posts.Content: Apr 26, 2011 07:01PM H-LYNN wrote: OH MY, I could have typed this today....I am amazed, as well.  After a weekend of family and friends, I needed the chocolate...too many complaints...too many...I just stayed away..I guess thats why I am called the princess bride....I will take it, even though its meant in a negative way, but to hell with them, I say...and that FEELS GREAT!  In fact, I am eating right now to dull the pain of my ct scan anxiety..I know I need to loose the weight, but I have bigger issues at the moment...Feels better to say it.... Ahhh, yes perspective.....I remember that.... Hugs, I
Posts.Title: Don't Sweet the Small Stuff Fitztwins Fitztwins
